verbs.description: Former first lady Michelle Obama [V: is] adding her voice to the rising chorus of criticism of the Trump administration 's policy of family separation at the border .
[ARG0: Former first lady Michelle Obama] is [V: adding] [ARG1: her voice] [ARG2: to the rising chorus of criticism of the Trump administration 's policy of family separation at the border] .
Former first lady Michelle Obama is adding her voice to the [V: rising] [ARG1: chorus] of criticism of the Trump administration 's policy of family separation at the border .
